Html:
Hi
Has anyone been able to do Dell server updates using WSUS Package Publisher.
It works fine with clients, but every time I want to import updates from the dell server catalog, it simply fails (and I can't seem to find a log or so to indicate why).
FYI, when using SCUP it works, but it also imports prerequisites if needed. Maybe that's what's going wrong, but I have no idea how to tell Wsus Package Publisher to do the same.
If anyone has an idea, just let me know.
Kind regards
